verses.verse: These are now the chief<WH7218> of their fathers<WH1>, and this is the genealogy<WH3187> of them that went up<WH5927> with me from Babylon<WH894>, in the reign<WH4438> of Artaxerxes<WH783> the king<WH4428>.
Of the sons<WH1121> of Phinehas<WH6372>; Gershom<WH1647>: of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar<WH385>; Daniel<WH1840>: of the sons<WH1121> of David<WH1732>; Hattush<WH2407>.

Of the sons<WH1121> of Shechaniah<WH7935>, of the sons<WH1121> of Pharosh<WH6551>; Zechariah<WH2148>: and with him were reckoned by genealogy<WH3187> of the males<WH2145> an hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572>.
Of the sons<WH1121> of Pahath<WH6355>â€“moab; Elihoenai<WH454> the son<WH1121> of Zerahiah<WH2228>, and with him two hundred<WH3967> males<WH2145>.
Of the sons<WH1121> of Shechaniah<WH7935>; the son<WH1121> of Jahaziel<WH3166>, and with him three<WH7969> hundred<WH3967> males<WH2145>.
Of the sons<WH1121> also of Adin<WH5720>; Ebed<WH5651> the son<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3129>, and with him fifty<WH2572> males<WH2145>.
And of the sons<WH1121> of Elam<WH5867>; Jeshaiah<WH3470> the son<WH1121> of Athaliah<WH6271>, and with him seventy<WH7657> males<WH2145>.
And of the sons<WH1121> of Shephatiah<WH8203>; Zebadiah<WH2069> the son<WH1121> of Michael<WH4317>, and with him fourscore<WH8084> males<WH2145>.
Of the sons<WH1121> of Joab<WH3097>; Obadiah<WH5662> the son<WH1121> of Jehiel<WH3171>, and with him two hundred<WH3967> and eighteen<WH8083> males<WH2145>.
And of the sons<WH1121> of Shelomith<WH8019>; the son<WH1121> of Josiphiah<WH3131>, and with him an hundred<WH3967> and threescore<WH8346> males<WH2145>.
And of the sons<WH1121> of Bebai<WH893>; Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Bebai<WH893>, and with him twenty<WH6242> and eight<WH8083> males<WH2145>.
And of the sons<WH1121> of Azgad<WH5803>; Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Hakkatan<WH6997>, and with him an hundred<WH3967> and ten<WH6235> males<WH2145>.
And of the last<WH314> sons<WH1121> of Adonikam<WH140>, whose names<WH8034> are these<WH467>, Eliphelet, Jeiel<WH3273>, and Shemaiah<WH8098>, and with them threescore<WH8346> males<WH2145>.
Of the sons<WH1121> also of Bigvai<WH902>; Uthai<WH5793>, and Zabbud<WH2072>, and with them seventy<WH7657> males<WH2145>.

And I gathered them together<WH6908> to the river<WH5104> that runneth<WH935> to Ahava<WH163>; and there abode we in tents<WH2583> three<WH7969> days<WH3117>: and I viewed<WH995> the people<WH5971>, and the priests<WH3548>, and found<WH4672> there none of the sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878>.

Then sent<WH7971> I for Eliezer<WH461>, for Ariel<WH740>, for Shemaiah<WH8098>, and for Elnathan<WH494>, and for Jarib<WH3402>, and for Elnathan<WH494>, and for Nathan<WH5416>, and for Zechariah<WH2148>, and for Meshullam<WH4918>, chief men<WH7218>; also for Joiarib<WH3114>, and for Elnathan<WH494>, men of understanding<WH995>.

And I sent<WH6680> them with commandment<WH3318> unto Iddo<WH112> the chief<WH7218> at the place<WH4725> Casiphia<WH3703>, and I told<WH7760> them what<WH1697> they should say<WH1696> unto Iddo<WH112>, and to his brethren<WH251> the Nethinims<WH5411>, at the place<WH4725> Casiphia<WH3703>, that they should bring<WH935> unto us ministers<WH8334> for the house<WH1004> of our God<WH430>.

And by the good<WH2896> hand<WH3027> of our God<WH430> upon us they brought<WH935> us a man<WH376> of understanding<WH7922>, of the sons<WH1121> of Mahli<WH4249>, the son<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878>, the son<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; and Sherebiah<WH8274>, with his sons<WH1121> and his brethren<WH251>, eighteen<WH8083>;
And Hashabiah<WH2811>, and with him Jeshaiah<WH3470> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari<WH4847>, his brethren<WH251> and their sons<WH1121>, twenty<WH6242>;

Also of the Nethinims<WH5411>, whom David<WH1732> and the princes<WH8269> had appointed<WH5414> for the service<WH5656> of the Levites<WH3881>, two hundred<WH3967> and twenty<WH6242> Nethinims<WH5411>: all of them were expressed<WH5344> by name<WH8034>.

Then I proclaimed<WH7121> a fast<WH6685> there<WH5104>, at the river of Ahava<WH163>, that we might afflict<WH6031> ourselves before<WH6440> our God<WH430>, to seek<WH1245> of him a right<WH3477> way<WH1870> for us<WH2945>, and for our little ones, and for all our substance<WH7399>.

For I was ashamed<WH954> to require<WH7592> of the king<WH4428> a band of soldiers<WH2428> and horsemen<WH6571> to help<WH5826> us against the enemy<WH341> in the way<WH1870>: because we had spoken<WH559> unto the king<WH4428>, saying<WH559>, The hand<WH3027> of our God<WH430> is upon all them for good<WH2896> that seek<WH1245> him<WH5797>; but his power and his wrath<WH639> is against all them that forsake him<WH5800>.
So we fasted<WH6684> and besought<WH1245> our God<WH430> for this<WH6279>: and he was intreated of us.
Then I separated<WH914> twelve<WH8147> of the chief<WH8269> of the priests<WH3548>, Sherebiah<WH8274>, Hashabiah<WH2811>, and ten<WH6235> of their brethren with them<WH251>,

And weighed<WH8254> unto them the silver<WH3701>, and the gold<WH2091>, and the vessels<WH3627>, even the offering<WH8641> of the house<WH1004> of our God<WH430>, which the king<WH4428>, and his counsellors<WH3289>, and his lords<WH8269>, and all Israel<WH3478> there present<WH4672>, had offered<WH7311>:

I even weighed<WH8254> unto their hand<WH3027> six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> and fifty<WH2572> talents<WH3603> of silver<WH3701>, and silver<WH3701> vessels<WH3627> an hundred<WH3967> talents<WH3603>, and of gold<WH2091> an hundred<WH3967> talents<WH3603>;
Also twenty<WH6242> basons<WH3713> of gold<WH2091>, of a thousand<WH505> drams<WH150>; and two<WH8147> vessels<WH3627> of fine<WH2896> copper<WH5178>, precious<WH2532> as gold<WH2091>.

And I said<WH559> unto them<WH6944>, Ye are holy unto the Lord<WH3068>; the vessels<WH3627> are holy<WH6944> also<WH3701>; and the silver and the gold<WH2091> are a freewill offering<WH5071> unto the Lord<WH3068> God<WH430> of your fathers<WH1>.

Watch<WH8245> ye<WH8104>, and keep them<WH8254>, until ye weigh them before<WH6440> the chief<WH8269> of the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881>, and chief<WH8269> of the fathers<WH1> of Israel<WH3478>, at Jerusalem<WH3389>, in the chambers<WH3957> of the house<WH1004> of the Lord<WH3068>.

So took<WH6901> the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881> the weight<WH4948> of the silver<WH3701>, and the gold<WH2091>, and the vessels<WH3627>, to bring<WH935> them to Jerusalem<WH3389> unto the house<WH1004> of our God<WH430>.

Then we departed<WH5265> from the river<WH5104> of Ahava<WH163> on the twelfth<WH8147> day of the first<WH7223> month<WH2320>, to go<WH3212> unto Jerusalem<WH3389>: and the hand<WH3027> of our God<WH430> was upon us<WH5337>, and he delivered us from the hand<WH3709> of the enemy<WH341>, and of such as lay in wait<WH693> by the way<WH1870>.
And we came<WH935> to Jerusalem<WH3389>, and abode<WH3427> there three<WH7969> days<WH3117>.

Now on the fourth<WH7243> day<WH3117> was the silver<WH3701> and the gold<WH2091> and the vessels<WH3627> weighed<WH8254> in the house<WH1004> of our God<WH430> by the hand<WH3027> of Meremoth<WH4822> the son<WH1121> of Uriah<WH223> the priest<WH3548>; and with him was Eleazar<WH499> the son<WH1121> of Phinehas<WH6372>; and with them was Jozabad<WH3107> the son<WH1121> of Jeshua<WH3442>, and Noadiah<WH5129> the son<WH1121> of Binnui<WH1131>, Levites<WH3881>;
By number<WH4557> and by weight<WH4948> of every one<WH4948>: and all the weight was written<WH3789> at that time<WH6256>.

Also the children<WH1121> of those that had been carried away<WH1473>, which were come out<WH935> of the captivity<WH7628>, offered<WH7126> burnt offerings<WH5930> unto the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, twelve<WH8147> bullocks<WH6499> for all Israel<WH3478>, ninety<WH8673> and six<WH8337> rams<WH352>, seventy<WH7657> and seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532>, twelve<WH8147> he goats<WH6842> for a sin offering<WH2403>: all this was a burnt offering<WH5930> unto the Lord<WH3068>.

And they delivered<WH5414> the king<WH4428>'s commissions<WH1881> unto the king<WH4428>'s lieutenants<WH323>, and to the governors<WH6346> on this side<WH5676> the river<WH5104>: and they furthered<WH5375> the people<WH5971>, and the house<WH1004> of God<WH430>.
